body.p: This version contains the NISP Volumes 1 - 3 in both html and pdf formats.

This document, ADatP-34(N) Ed. B Ver 2, is developed by the Interoperability Profiles Capability Team (IP CaT) under the authority of the NATO Consultation, Command and Control Board (C3B). It was noted by the C3 Board (AC/322-WP(2023)0051-REV 1) making the Volume 2 standards and profiles mandatory for use in NATO common funded systems, and made available to the general public as a replacement for ADatP-34(N)(1).
